attributes.action: Sack Sir David Nicholson NHS Chief Executive
attributes.additional_details:
Sir David Nicholson has show gross incompetence when previously presiding over West Midlands Strategic Health Authority in not recognising the developing scandal at North Staffordshire Hospital.

He was not a fit & proper person to have been promoted to his current role as Chief Executive of the NHS & with the findings of the public enquiry published he should be removed from his post with immediate effect.

rejection.details: Please see: Sir David Nicholson to resign over NHS failings
